node.html:
• Led the development of impactful customer-facing projects as the go-to Ruby on Rails specialist, driving the creation of dynamic web applications that met clients' unique needs
  • Translated intricate programming requirements into seamless front-end website experiences, ensuring exceptional user interactions, while also effectively addressing intricate challenges in back-end server code to guarantee reliability and scalability
  • Pioneered the implementation of a robust automated testing framework, utilizing cutting-edge automation tools
  • Collaborated with the Technical Director to develop web applications, produced well-organized, optimized, and documented source code promptly, and worked with other programmers to design and implement features
  • Debugged existing source code and polished feature sets to ensure they met the client's requirements
  • Proficient in Amazon Web Services includes EC2, Beanstalk, CloudWatch, S3, Route 53, and IAM
  • Implemented AWS CodeBuild and CodePipeline for seamless integration and deployment, effectively managing multiple Beanstalk instances
  • Created frontend web designs using React JS and Vue JS, ensuring the responsiveness of web applications
  • Extensive experience in Real-Time Applications and deep knowledge of Message Frameworks
  • Improved the performance of live projects by fixing bugs, addressing memory leaks, optimizing quiries, and caching etc

• Ensured the performance and quality of reusable code
  • Proficiency in Ruby on Rails and Embedded Ruby with Tailwind CSS
  • Created responsive frontend web designs and improved code health through a consistent approach and regular auditing using GitHub

• Worked as a freelacer on various projects with remote teams across the globe
  • Delivered over 80 projects

• Worked as a junior REACT developer
  • Convert 50+ figma pages to user interface
  • Learned about REACT, Redux in-depth
